nodes.text: Wurrek were a type of tentacled creature with red skin. In 0 BBY, a human inhabitant of Jedha City on the moon Jedha was cooking a wurrek in a pan over a fire in the city's streets as the rebel operatives Jyn Erso and Cassian Andor walked past, shortly before the city's destruction by the Death Star superweapon.

Wurreks first appeared in the 2016 Anthology series film, Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. They were first identified in the current canon in the video "Every Creature in the Star Wars Movies", which was released by the Star Wars Kids Youtube channel in 2019. The creatures originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the Smugglers of Naboo Fast-Play Game, a 2000 supplement for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
